mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(erai.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS create_time, erai.rate_type AS rate_type_int, erai.content FROM erp_record_info eri LEFT JOIN `erp_rate_info` erai ON eri.`rate_id` = erai.id WHERE eri.hospital_id = #{hospitalId, jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id from erp_rate_info where hospital_id = #{hospitalId, jdbcType=INTEGER} and rate_type = #{rateType, jdbcType=INTEGER} order by create_time desc limit 0,1

SELECT ehi.id, ehi.name, erai.department_name AS departmentName, erai.rate_type AS rateType, CONCAT(eri.`start_date`,' ~ ',eri.`end_date`) AS recordValidityDate FROM (SELECT b.id, b.create_time, b.update_time, b.STATUS, b.user_name, b.user_phone, b.hospital_id, b.department_name, b.rate_type,b.content FROM (SELECT a.id, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.STATUS, a.user_name, a.user_phone, a.hospital_id, a.department_name, a.rate_type,a.content FROM erp_rate_info a ORDER BY a.create_time DESC LIMIT 1000) b GROUP BY b.hospital_id ) erai LEFT JOIN `erp_record_info` eri ON eri.`rate_id` = erai.id LEFT JOIN `erp_hospital_info` ehi ON ehi.id = eri.`hospital_id` WHERE eri.`check_status` = 1 AND eri.`company_id` = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
